totem.sound
Class TAudioSignal

java.lang.Object
  totem.sound.TAudioSignal

public class TAudioSignal
extends java.lang.Object

Implementation of AudioSignal. It just stores the received stereo sound information and make it accessible for other object.

Author:
alex
